sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"嘶哑的，沙哑的"之意。
means: hoarse ： 指嘶哑刺耳的声音，通常因高声喊叫后嗓子失音所致。
harsh ： 一般多指刺耳难听的声音。
rough ： 指粗哑难听的声音。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"粗糙的"之意。
means: rough ： 普通用词，指某物纹理不精细，或表面凹凸不平，不光滑。
coarse ： 指某物质地粗糙低劣或编织、加工等不精细、精巧。也指人的言谈举止粗鲁，不文雅。
harsh ： 指外表、性质、声音的粗糙、刺耳、刺目，强调使人不愉快的粗糙感。
rude ： 指加工粗糙、不精细。也指某人的言行举止粗鲁无礼，缺乏修养。
crude ： 主要指未经加工处理尚处于自然状态的物质；也可指人的言行粗鲁。

word_mean: 具有不规则的粗糙表面的

sentence.Network_en: The company I work for went through a rough patch.
sentence.Network_cn: 我所在的公司经历了一段困难时期。

sentence.Network_en: She passed the needle through the rough cloth, back and forth.
sentence.Network_cn: 她一针一针地缝那块粗布。

sentence.Network_en: A fishing vessel and a cargo ship collided in rough seas.
sentence.Network_cn: 一艘捕鱼船和一艘货船在波涛汹涌的海上相撞了。

新东方六级高频词汇整理_百度文库 ... feeble a. 脆弱的，虚弱的 rough a. 粗略的，不精确的 rude a. 粗鲁的，不礼貌的.

list.abs: 西施犬|西施狗|纯种西施犬 ... ·雪纳瑞（ SCHNAUZER） ·苏格兰牧羊犬（ ROUGH COLLIE） ·喜乐蒂（ SHETLAND SHEEPDOG）.

roughness 糙率roughness coefficient 粗糙系数roundness 圆度
怎样找关于交通规则的一些英语。_爱问知识人 ... 27. 陡坡 steep hill 28. 不平整路 rough road 29. 弯路 curve road;bend road.

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)a male sexual partner whose toughness or lack of sophistication is a source of attraction
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)（以强壮和粗犷吸引人的）男性性伙伴

jx.jx_en_mean: in a natural state; without decoration or other treatment
jx.jx_cn_mean: 自然状态的；未加工的；原始的；粗糙的

lj.lj_ly: even before the recession hit, the project was in the rough.
lj.lj_ls: 甚至在遭受经济衰退袭击之前，这个项目已经处于困境了。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 粗糙但有效的，粗糙但尚能顶用的

lj.lj_ls: 一种粗糙但切实的估计方法。

jx.jx_cn_mean: (澳／新西兰，非正式)缺少教养的；粗鄙的；鄙俗的

phrase.cizu_name: the rough edge (或side) of one's tongue

lj.lj_ly: you two stop quarrelling or you'll get the rough edge of my tongue.
lj.lj_ls: 你们俩别争吵了，否则你们要挨我的痛骂。

jx.jx_en_mean: small imperfections in someone or something that is basically satisfactory
treatment that is not scrupulously fair or in accordance with the law

jx.jx_cn_mean: 艰难时期；艰难进程；艰难经历

lj.lj_ly: rebel shareholders are expected to &B{give} officials &B{a rough ride}.
lj.lj_ls: 反叛的股东预计要把高级行政人员折腾一番。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 喧闹的行为；粗鲁的行为，暴力行为

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit.)sleep in uncomfortable conditions, typically out of doors

phrase.cizu_name: take the rough with the smooth

jx.jx_en_mean: accept the difficult or unpleasant aspects of life as well as the good
jx.jx_cn_mean: 既能享乐也能吃苦；好事和坏事都受得了
(非正式)用暴力对待，向…动粗；狠揍

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English rūh, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch ruw and German rauh

entry.def: If a surface is rough, it is uneven and not smooth.

example.ex: His hands were rough and calloused, from years of karate practice...
example.tran: 由于多年练习空手道，他的双手粗糙不平，布满老茧。

example.ex: Grace made her way slowly across the rough ground.
example.tran: 格雷斯缓慢地走过高低不平的地面。

entry.tran: (人或行为)粗暴的，粗野的，粗鲁的
entry.def: You say that people or their actions are rough when they use too much force and not enough care or gentleness.

example.ex: Rugby's a rough game at the best of times...
example.tran: 即使是在比赛最不激烈的时候，橄榄球也是一种粗野的运动。

example.ex: They have complained of discrimination and occasional rough treatment.
example.tran: 他们抗议遭受歧视，而且偶尔还会遭到粗暴的对待。

entry.tran: (地区、城市、学校等)危险的，充斥暴力的，犯罪率高的
entry.def: A rough area, city, school, or other place is unpleasant and dangerous because there is a lot of violence or crime there.

example.ex: It was quite a rough part of our town.
example.tran: 这是我们城里犯罪率很高的地区。

entry.tran: (日子)艰难的，困难的，不愉快的
entry.def: If you say that someone has had a rough time, you mean that they have had some difficult or unpleasant experiences.

example.ex: All women have a rough time in our society...
example.tran: 在我们的社会中，所有女性的日子都不好过。

example.ex: Tomorrow, he knew, would be a rough day.
example.tran: 他知道明天将会是艰难的一天。

entry.def: If you feel rough, you feel ill.

example.ex: The virus won't go away and the lad is still feeling a bit rough.
example.tran: 病毒无法清除，这个小伙子仍然觉得有点不舒服。

entry.tran: (计算、猜测)大概的，粗略的，不精确的
entry.def: A rough calculation or guess is approximately correct, but not exact.

example.ex: We were only able to make a rough estimate of how much fuel would be required...
example.tran: 我们只能对所需燃料作一个粗略的估计。

example.ex: As a rough guide, a horse needs 2.5 per cent of his body weight in food every day.
example.tran: 作为一个大致的参照，一匹马每天需要吃相当于其体重2.5％的食物。

entry.tran: (想法、描述)粗略的，简略的，大致的;(图画)简笔的
entry.def: If you give someone a rough idea, description, or drawing of something, you indicate only the most important features, without much detail.

example.ex: I've got a rough idea of what he looks like...
example.tran: 我已经大致知道他长什么样子了。

example.ex: It often helps to make a rough sketch showing where the vehicles were.
example.tran: 画一个简略的草图标示车辆当时所在的位置往往很有用。

entry.tran: 做工粗糙的;不精致的;简陋的
entry.def: You can say that something is rough when it is not neat and well made.

example.ex: ...chairs set in a rough circle in the middle of the room.
example.tran: 房间中央大致围成一圈的椅子

entry.tran: (天气)恶劣的，狂风暴雨的;(海面)波浪滔天的
entry.def: If the sea or the weather at sea is rough, the weather is windy or stormy and there are very big waves.

example.ex: A fishing vessel and a cargo ship collided in rough seas.
example.tran: 一艘捕鱼船和一艘货船在波涛汹涌的海上相撞了。

entry.tran: 风餐露宿地;无家可归地;流浪地
entry.def: When people sleep or live rough, they sleep out of doors, usually because they have no home.

example.ex: It makes me so sad when I see young people begging or sleeping rough on the streets.
example.tran: 我看到年轻人沿街乞讨、露宿街头，心里会非常难过。

entry.tran: 过（从前没有过的）艰苦的生活
entry.def: If you have to rough it, you have to live without the possessions and comforts that you normally have.

example.ex: You won't be roughing it; each room comes equipped with a telephone and a 3-channel radio.
example.tran: 你不会过得太艰苦;每个房间都配备了一部电话和一台可以接收3个频道的收音机。

means.word_mean: 1. the part of a golf course bordering the fairway where the grass is not cut short
1. prepare in preliminary or sketchy form
1. having or caused by an irregular surface;
2. (of persons or behavior) lacking refinement or finesse;

sentences.sentence: "she was a diamond in the rough"
"the fierce thunders roar me their music"- Ezra Pound

means.word_mean: 6. unpleasantly harsh or grating in sound;
7. ready and able to resort to force or violence;

sentences.sentence: "pugnacious spirits...lamented that there was so little prospect of an exhilarating disturbance"- Herman Melville
"they were rough and determined fighting men"

means.word_mean: 8. of the margin of a leaf shape; having the edge cut or fringed or scalloped
9. not shaped by cutting or trimming;

sentences.sentence: "a crude cabin of logs with bark still on them"
"wild and harsh country full of hot sand and cactus"
"the nomad life is rough and hazardous"

means.word_mean: 1. with roughness or violence (`rough' is an informal variant for `roughly');
2. with rough motion as over a rough surface;

auth_sentence.content: They blame the rough conditions, and the cold.
auth_sentence.res_content: They blame the rough conditions, and the cold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They blame the rough conditions, and the cold.

auth_sentence.content: Dry rough/substance encountered the grind / of my teeth.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dry rough/substance encountered the grind / of my teeth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dry rough/substance encountered the grind / of my teeth.

auth_sentence.content: Here the road was rough, its margins indistinct.
auth_sentence.res_content: Here the road was rough, its margins indistinct.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here the road was rough, its margins indistinct.

Sentence.sentence: However, Soren Andreasen, a social scientist at Dalberg Global Development Partners who supervised the writing of the report, defended it, saying that it was clear that the numbers were rough estimates.
Its rough estimates are meant to draw the attention of world leaders

sentences.en: The rough road made the car vibrate.
sentences.cn: 坑坑洼洼的道路使车颠得厉害。

means.word_mean: 粗鲁的; 粗暴的; 粗野的; 剧烈的

sentences.cn: 足球是一种很剧烈的运动。

sentences.en: His reply was a bit rough.
sentences.cn: 他的答复过于粗鲁了一点。

sentences.en: Don't be so rough with the child.

means.word_mean: 粗制的; 粗略的; 概略的

sentences.en: As the jewel was in the rough state, he had no idea what size it would be when cut.
sentences.cn: 这块宝石未经琢磨, 他不知道加工后有多大。

sentences.en: It's just a very rough translation.
sentences.cn: 这只是一篇非常粗糙的译稿。

means.word_mean: (味道、声音等)令人不快的; 难吃的; 刺耳的

sentences.en: The little boy has a rough tongue.
sentences.cn: 这个小男孩讲话很不中听。

sentences.en: We had rather a rough time.
sentences.cn: 我们经历了一段艰苦的日子。

sentences.en: The explorers had to rough it when they got into the jungle.
sentences.cn: 那些探险者进入丛林后, 不得不过着艰苦的生活。

means.word_mean: 使粗糙；使不平滑(常与up连用)

sentences.en: Hard household chores roughed her hands.
sentences.cn: 繁重的家务劳动把她的手弄得很粗糙。

means.word_mean: 【体育】(橄榄球、足球等比赛中)粗暴对待(常与up连用

sentences.en: Don't rough them up in the game.They are still boys.
sentences.cn: 比赛时别对他们撒野，他们还是些孩子。

sentences.en: The centre forward of our school team was sent off the field by the referee for roughing.
sentences.cn: 我们校队的中锋因动作粗野被裁判判罚出场。

jushi.english: They knocked together a rough box with wooden boards.
jushi.chinese: 他们用木板草草地做成了一个粗糙的箱子。

jushi.english: The ship was badly knocked about by a rough sea.
jushi.chinese: 船被巨浪颠簸得很厉害。

jushi.english: Would it be wise to launch into this rough sea?
jushi.chinese: 到这样汹涌的大海中游泳明智吗?
